overview: Manowar Blood in Brazil, performed 26th September 1998, Sao Paulo, Brazil. Metal Daze Blood of my Enemies Kill with Power Sign of the Hammer Gates of Valhalla Sting of the Bumblebee  The Gods Made Heavy Metal Metal Warriors Kings of Metal  The Power  Hail and kill Black wind, Fire and Steel The Crown and the King
title: Manowar: Blood In Brazil
